column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's called "white" because the broth was half pork broth and half chicken broth. It came with the usual pork belly
column4: chives topped with shreds of deep fried onions and thin noodles (some ramen choices come with thick noodles!) I also asked for fresh garlic (no extra fee) and a garlic press to add some extra flavor to the broth. In addition
column5: I added some red flakes and some ramen seasoning that they had available already at the table. It was great! They give a lot of noodles compared to other ramen places I've been to
column6: so it was almost difficult for me to finish the entire bowl lol.
